website_summaries.verdict: This telescoping gaff extends to almost double its original length, so it's great for fishing trips where storage is at a premium.
pros: Features stainless steel hook and EVA foam handle
Telescoping design from 28 to 45 inches, so it's portable and easy to stow
Comes with safety hook tip cover
cons: Floats with the foam handle attached, but the handle can fall off

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for controlling king mackerel while on my kayak. Very sharp and does not get dull. I have used it and caught multiple fish and it is still very sharp. Very easy to use and control larger fish.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Gaff
customer_reviews.text: Overall well constructed. Should last for many years of service. The metal part is actually quite a bit more orange than shown in the picture. Not a huge con, but I thought it would be more silver. I cannot say whether or not it will float, as I have not tested that. However, it is very lightweight and will probably float. The lanyard seems good enough. Also, included is a protector for the point. It is decent quality and better than others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Free88Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Does not slide easily
customer_reviews.text: The I received looked very well made. I found that it does not slide to open very easily. If it is not lined up perfectly you have to continually adjust it to move. I am going to keep it because I will just keep it fully open. If you need to make it slide stay away from this one. I might return it to see if I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and strength
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gaff I have purchased. It works awesome, floats, and is well made. You can use it in saltwater.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyB

customer_reviews.title: This gaff works great. I've gaffed some decent halibut with this
customer_reviews.text: This gaff works great. I've gaffed some decent halibut with this, the biggest was 90 lbs. I use a small boat so the telescoping definitely saves some space.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sloma

customer_reviews.title: Not a floater, but still a good gaff.
customer_reviews.text: Great gaff for small boats. Thing is it’s not a floater. Ok. Ok. It floats for about 3 minutes. Just long enough to let you think you’re getting it back.
customer_reviews.author: Old salty

customer_reviews.title: Beefy!
customer_reviews.text: This will do the job! Can’t wait to hoist a big halibut onto my kayak with this!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Parker

customer_reviews.title: to use to pull/relocate anchor rode chain in the anchor locker on my sailboat that piles up under the windlass and it does that
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a totally different purpose than fishing, to use to pull/relocate anchor rode chain in the anchor locker on my sailboat that piles up under the windlass and it does that job just fine. it seems well made with a very sharp point and will double for fishing IF I ever catch anything.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp and stable. Floating feature is essential for kayak fishing. Must have for big game, I do reccomended a net as well though. Get those halibut!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Double

customer_reviews.title: One and Done
customer_reviews.text: On my first time using I reached out of boat and foam grip handle came off in my hand and gaff went straight to the bottom. Complete waste of $39.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hopf

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Comes very sharp. Seems well constructed. Had no issues with 30lbs carp. Also has a hook point cover for when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Does feel good.
customer_reviews.text: Had surface rust when it arrived surface. But. Does feel good.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well constructed and does what it was made for. Minus one star for the aluminum surface, it’s slick when wet but this goes for all aluminum gaffs so the issue is not specific to this product alone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The gaff works great! And it does float like they say it does. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for the price seems well built
customer_reviews.author: Blake Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I although I wish the part that tightens was made out of metal instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak Gaff
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gaff for kayak fishing. I have used it for fish and also as a boat hook to retrieve lines and floats while hoop netting for lobster. Great price, very well made and the point cover is great for safety in the close quarters ov my Hobie Pro Angler Kayak.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great gaff, but I lost it on my launch from my new kayak on first trip
customer_reviews.author: Pearlina B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service
customer_reviews.text: Really fast service. Haven't used yet but it's what I'd been looking for. Needed it on my boat for jugging. Will work great for it.
customer_reviews.author: kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, light weight. Easy to use. And it floats. First time out handled big sharks and skates with ease. I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Volz

product_meta.title: Promar GF-301 Telescopic Float Gaff, 29-46-Inch
product_meta.description: Headquartered in Gardena, California – Promar is a global leader of fishing tackle accessories and outdoor products. With over 60 years of manufacturing and product development experience, we currently manufacture more than 500 products under our brands. Driven by innovation and rooted in quality, Promar premium products are designed, built, and customized to provide an enhanced experience for the outdoor enthusiast.
feature_bullets: Promar premium products are designed, built, and customized to provide an enhanced experience for the outdoor enthusiast.
With over 60 years of manufacturing and product development experience, we currently manufacture more than 500 products under our brands
